column2: You can choose a personal patron deity from among the many powerful gods and godesses of the West African faith.
I should dedicate myself to particular aspect of my religion, and let it benefit my rule.
Tano, the god of rivers and war.
Choosing these as my patron would be a testament to the power of my dynasty.
The spider Anansi, collector of stories.
Nyame, he who knows and sees everything.
Asase Ya, divine wife of Nyame.
